The Meaning of Life

This is one of the big questions humankind has posed to itself but yet not have answered. What am I talking about? Some people like to look for crazy patterns. Like here: ababab abab abab baba
This is another line. What could one possibly look for? Are people looking for patterns like this: baba ab ab aaa? Or rather bab bab aba?

Now, let's talk about "affect versus effect"! Why? Well, there are reoccurring patterns which are interesting to the Boyer-Moore algorithm.

To sum up, evaluation in NLP is a field on its own and deserves more attention.
